attributes.action: Apply treason law if any attempt is made by parliament to cede sovereignty away
attributes.additional_details:
1973 0% voted to join EEC as not asked
1975 0% voted to remain in EU, it was EEC
1992 0% voted for Maastricht not asked
2007 0% voted for Lisbon not asked
2004 0% voted for open borders 
For us to be living in a fully functioning democracy with MPs we can trust, we must take measures to prevent this happening again
attributes.background:
MPs are entrusted with the powers of the public. 
But they have ceded Sovereignty away treaty by treaty to Brussels over the last 45 years without our consent. This has been a theft of public rights. We need written constitution ensuring application of treason laws to prevent this happening again.

rejection.details: The interpretation and application of the law is the responsibility of the courts, which are independent of the UK Government and Parliament.
